block.p: Brigit Colleen Pinnell and Lucas Lyn Falk are to be married today in Garrison, N.Y. Rabbi Alan David Londy is to officiate at the Garrison Inn.

Ms. Pinnell, 30, will keep her name. She is the director of economic development and communications for the Fulton Mall Improvement Association, a business improvement district in downtown Brooklyn. She graduated with bachelor's degrees in geography and communications from the University of Washington and received a master's degree in urban planning from New York University. She is a daughter of Carol J. Pinnell of Ridgefield, Wash., and Steven S. Pinnell of Portland, Ore.
Brigit Colleen Pinnell and Lucas Lyn Falk are to be married today in Garrison, N.Y. Rabbi Alan David Londy is to officiate at the Garrison Inn.
Brigit Colleen Pinnell and Lucas Lyn Falk are to be married today in Garrison, N.Y. Rabbi Alan David Londy is to officiate at the Garrison Inn.

Ms. Pinnell, 30, will keep her name. She is the director of economic development and communications for the Fulton Mall Improvement Association, a business improvement district in downtown Brooklyn. She graduated with bachelor's degrees in geography and communications from the University of Washington and received a master's degree in urban planning from New York University. She is a daughter of Carol J. Pinnell of Ridgefield, Wash., and Steven S. Pinnell of Portland, Ore.

Mr. Falk, 27, is a project manager, in Manhattan, for energy efficiency and green residential construction programs at the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority. He graduated from Colorado College and received a master's degree in urban planning from N.Y.U., where the couple met. He is a son of Randye G. Falk and Dr. Jay L. Falk of Maitland, Fla.
